datafield.subfield: Physics and chemistry of classical materials :
edited by Ewa Kłodzińska, PhD, A.K. Haghi, PhD, and Gennady E. Zaikov, DSc.

A lecture note on quantum-chemical calculation of molecular of 1-[2-(O-Acetylmethyl)-3-O-Acetyl-2-Ethyl]-Methyldichlorinephosphite (I) and components of its synthesis / V.A. Babkin [and four others] -- Quantum-chemical lecture note on the mechanism of synthesis of 1-[2-(O-Acetylmethyl)-3-O-Acetyl-2-Ethyl]-Methyldichlorinephosphite / V.A. Babkin [and four others] -- A lecture note on the effect of antioxidant compounds on oxidative stress in unicellular aquatic organisms / O.V. Karpukhina, K.Z. Gumargalieva, and A.N. Inozemtsev -- On the diffusion of ammonium salts in aqueous solutions / Luís M.P. Veríssimo [and four others] -- A lecture note on influence of electric current on the oxidation process of conductive polymer compositions / E.O. Sazonova, and I.A. Kirsh -- A technical note on quantum and wave characteristics of spatial-energy interactions / G.A. Korablev, and G.E. Zaikov -- A technical note on nanocomposites poly (vinyl chloride)/organoclay flame-resistance / I.V. Dolbin, G.V. Kozlov, G.E. Zaikov, and A.K. Mikitaev -- A short note on reinforcement mechanism of polymer nano composites / G.V. Kozlov, K.S. Dibirova, G.M. Magomedov, and G.E. Zaikov -- A research note on reinforcement degree of semicrystalline polymers as natural hybrid nanocomposites / G.M. Magomedov, K.S. Dibirova, G.V. Kozlov, and G.E. Zaikov -- Kinetic modeling of polystyrene controlled radical polymerization / Nikolai V. Ulitin [and four others] -- A research note on semi empirical and DFT modeling of the IR spectra of benzoyl peroxide derivatives / N.A. Turovskij [and five others] -- Polyelectrolyte ensym-bearing microdiagnosticum : a new step in clinical-biochemistry analysis / Sergey A. Tikhonenko, Alexei V. Dubrovsky, Ekaterina A. Saburova, and Lyudmila I. Shabarchina -- A research note on transport properties of films of chitosan amikacin / A.S. shurshina, E.I. Kulish, and S.V. Kolesov -- Crystalline phase morphology in polymer/organoclay nanocomposites / K.S. Dibirova, G.V. Kozlov, G.M. Magomedov, and G.E. Zaikov -- Achievements in design and synthesis of hydrogel-based supports / D. Horák, and H. Hlídková -- Structural changes in synthetic minerals / A.M. Ignatova, and M.N. Ignatov -- A research note on ozonation as a method of unsaturated rubber modification for improving its adhesion properties / V.F. Koblov [and five others] -- A research note on the intumescent fire and heat retardant coatings based on perchlorovinyl resin for fiberglass plastics / V.F. Kablov [and four others] -- A lecture note on influence of hidrophylic filler on fire resistance of epoxy composites / V.F. Kablov [and four others] -- Polyelectrolyte microsensors as a new tool for metabolites' detection / Kazakova L.I., Sukhorukov G.B., and Shabarchina L. I. -- Simulation in classical nanomaterials : new development and achievements / Shima Maghsoodlou and Arezoo Afzali.
